This is a test post done on September 14

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```
Here I insert a chart
```{r boh, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
qmfr_data <- readRDS(here("static", "data", "QMFR data Q22018.Rds"))
qmfr_data %>% ggplot(aes(x=date, y=United.States.dollar)) +
        geom_line() +
        labs(title="KES vs USD", subtitle="The Kenyan Shilling has been decreasin in value, why?", y="KES per 1 dollar" ) +
        scale_y_reverse() +
        theme_minimal()
        
```
